text: @JDiamond1 Do all the people who are clambering for him to get back to rallies realize that a) this GREATLY increases the chances of him and Pence getting COVID-19 b) if he and Pence are rendered incapable of performing their duties...  Nancy Pelosi becomes President of the United States?
